title: godoc and GOPATH failings
body:
If GOPATH is set and you run godoc locally (e.g., godoc -http=:8000), the first web page
shows a 'src' link that leads to the docs for the packages in the _first_ path in GOPATH.

(1) I think the 'src' link should be renamed 'Local' or 'GOPATH' to make it clearer;

(2) godoc should list all the programs & packages from all the GOPATH directories
(maybe using the path in bold as a separator in case some names are the same)
